sn45.83:1.2: Yonisomanasikarasampannassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham—ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavessati, ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikarissati.
sn45.83:1.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikarasampanno ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti, ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaroti?
sn45.83:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn45.83:1.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikarasampanno ariyam atthangikam maggam bhaveti, ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaroti”ti.
